title: Whenever I open New Client I get this Black Screen
body:
It's not my internet, as I'm connected to ethernet. Whenever I open the client it just opens a black window in the corner, and I can't close it unless I force quit. At first, I was able to fix by just restarting and reopening, but now even that doesn't work. Any suggestions? I'm on a macbook pro.

[http://imgur.com/a/mO97l

That's a screenshot of what the screen looks like.

replies.body: A black screen like this is usually a result of a bad connection that's failing to download assets.  Even if you are on ethernet, you can have an unstable connection or settings blocking it from reaching our servers properly.  You'll want to start off by going through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if you have any questions!
